message: Is there is any English FB group similar to this awesome group?

data.message: And your definition of an "English FB group" is what?
I mean English Facebook group this is an Arabic group?

Be specific, this indeed is by definition an Arabic group since it's an Egyptian group. However, it isn't an Arabic speaking group. Most, if not everything here from shared material to community discussions are in English.
Nonetheless, I'm not aware of any non-MENA English groups with the same purpose as ours. You might have some luck finding decent stuff for specific technologies. I suppose someone else here might know better.

Good luck.
